item.title: About
item.description: Hi there My name is Samuel Horovatin and I'm the proud owner of this site! I have made this as a mixture blog/portfolio/resume. I am currently in my final year of Computer Science at the University of Saskatchewan. I have experience in project management, back-end technology, cloud, and API development. In addition I have experience working in C, C#, Rust, and Python. I am passionate about Bioinformatics, Genetics, Ichthyology, and Paleontology.
